Docs.param: A permanent non-localized name for the parameter.
The minimum allowed value of the parameter.
The maximum allowed value of the parameter.
The unit of measurement in which the parameter is expressed.

param.name: unitName
param.para: The localized name of the parameter.

Docs.param: The parameter options for the parameter.

param.name: valueStrings
param.para: The localized value strings for the parameter.

Docs.summary: Creates a new parameter with the specified values.
